channel.description: Recent content in undergrad on Ryan Moodie

item.title: Laidlaw Scholarship Experiences
item.description: This blog post was featured on Laidlaw Scholarship Experiences. BEC Hello everyone, I hope you are all doing well. (Do you get the joke of the title? It is condensed and I am studying condensates! No, OK, it is not very funny…) I have thoroughly enjoyed reading through all the posts before mine. Thank you all for sharing your experiences and in such excellent prose. Everybody’s projects sound so interesting and I can feel the contagious enthusiasm in every post.
